name: CVPlanarPixelBufferInfo_YCbCrPlanar
desc: A structure for describing YCbCr planar buffers.

items.name: init(componentInfoY: CVPlanarComponentInfo, componentInfoCb: CVPlanarComponentInfo, componentInfoCr: CVPlanarComponentInfo)
var componentInfoCb: CVPlanarComponentInfo
items.desc: A CVPlanarComponentInfo structure containing information on the Cb component of the buffer.

items.name: var componentInfoCr: CVPlanarComponentInfo
items.desc: A CVPlanarComponentInfo structure containing information on the Cr component of the buffer.

items.name: var componentInfoY: CVPlanarComponentInfo
items.desc: A CVPlanarComponentInfo structure containing information on the Y component of the buffer.
